PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Ordered packing of polymer chains is beneficial for improving the charge mobility of resulting films.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Ordered packing of polymer chains |
| Charge mobility of resulting films |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Ordered packing of polymer chains |
| Charge mobility |
| of resulting films |

[Explanation: "Ordered packing of polymer chains" refers to the arrangement of polymer chains in a specific order, which is a material property. "Charge mobility" is the ability of charges to move through a material, which is also a material property. "Of resulting films" specifies the material to which the property "charge mobility" applies.]
